釚字的基本解释

釚
qiú
弩牙，弩上钩弦发箭的机具。

釚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
亦作“釻1”。
(1)弩机上钩弦发箭的机具。
(2)为人名用字。清有徐釚。见《清诗别裁集》卷十二。

釚字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　釚； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1296第05
【廣韻】巨鳩切【集韻】渠尤切，?音求。【玉篇】弩牙。【集韻】或作䤛?。【篇海類編】亦作釓。

釚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
釚字的起名意思

暂无。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
qiú
Crossbow teeth, a machine used to send arrows on a crossbow.
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
Also known as "釻1".
(1) The equipment used for hooking and firing arrows on a crossbow.
(2) Use words for names. There is Xu Yan in Qing Dynasty. See Volume 12 of "The Collection of Qing Poems".
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　釚; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1296 No. 05
[Guangyun] Giant Dove Cut [Jiyun] Qu Youqie, please? [Jade articles] Crossbow teeth. [Ji Yun] Or as 䤛?. [Articles of sea category] also made 釓.
